titles.title: To move the April 15, 2021 estimated tax payment deadline to May 17, 2021 for individuals and corporations.
To move the April 15, 2021 estimated tax payment deadline to May 17, 2021 for individuals and corporations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill extends from April 15 to May 17 in 2021, the date of the first scheduled estimated income tax payment for individuals and corporations.
